channel.title: community on PrestaShop Developers' blog
channel.description: Recent content in community on PrestaShop Developers' blog

item.title: PrestaShop Developer Conference in Paris: Program and Registration
item.description: If you’re a PrestaShop developer or enthusiast looking to broaden your knowledge and connect with fellow community members, the PrestaShop Developer Conference is the event for you. Scheduled for November 30, 2023, in Paris, France, the conference promises an in-depth exploration of technical topics, innovative solutions, and ample opportunities to network and engage with peers who share your passion for PrestaShop. We’re also very happy to go over the recent unveiling of the agenda, packed with compelling sessions and engaging activities.

item.title: PrestaShop Live Update - October 2023
item.description: The project’s live update was held for the ninth time this year and streamed live on October 11th, 2023. PrestaShop Live Update - October 2023 It was a special Live Update where we said goodbye to the project leader, Pablo Borowicz, who, after over six years, is leaving the PrestaShop company. On behalf of everyone in the project, I would like to thank him for all the work he has done for the project and wish him all the best in his future endeavors.

item.title: Announcing October PrestaShop Project Live Update
item.description: The ninth Live Update for the PrestaShop Project will happen on Wednesday, October 11th, 2023 at 4 pm (Paris time) on YouTube! We will go over the latest project updates, take a look at recent changes in the software, changes made in the developer documentation and at the end of the session we will make a very special announcement. Join us on YouTube! Remember that at the end of every meeting, there is a Q&A session.

item.title: Hacktoberfest 2023
item.description: The month of October is coming quickly! So be prepared for Hacktoberfest, a month-long celebration of open source software. Hacktoberfest 2023 The online event has been happening every October since 2013 and is sponsored by DigitalOcean. This year marks the 10th anniversary of the event, with changes to help ensure its sustainability for the next decade. Youâ€™ll learn about these right below. How can you participate? Very simple: people are encouraged to create at least 4 pull requests for open source projects on GitHub.

item.title: PrestaShop Live Update - September 2023
item.description: The project’s live update was held for the eighth time this year and streamed live on September 13th, 2023. The session’s agenda was as follows: 00:00 Beginning of the session: the introduction 02:30 Project news: PrestaShop Developer Conference 04:28 Project news: PrestaShop 8.1.1, 8.0.5 and 1.7.8.10 08:56 Demo: changes in the developer documentation by @thomasnares 43:00 Q&A session You can use the timestamps to jump directly to the parts you want to watch.

item.title: Announcing September PrestaShop Project Live Update
item.description: The eighth Live Update for the PrestaShop Project will happen on Wednesday, September 13th, 2023 at 4 pm (Paris time) on YouTube! We will go over the latest project updates, take a look at recent changes in the software, changes made in the developer documentation, and more! Remember that at the end of every meeting, there is a Q&A session. You can ask your questions during the presentation or beforehand. If you have questions related to the open source project, feel free to let us know in advance using this form.

item.title: The PrestaShop Developer Conference is coming to Paris!
item.description: Are you a passionate PrestaShop developer or enthusiast, wanting to expand your knowledge and network within the community? The PrestaShop team is happy to let you know the call for presentations is open for the PrestaShop Developer Conference, taking place in Paris, France on November 30, 2023. This event promises to be an opportunity to engage in technical discussions, discover solutions, and connect with like-minded peers in the community. So, what is the PrestaShop Developer Conference?

item.title: PrestaShop Live Update - July 2023
item.description: The project’s live update was held for the seventh time this year and streamed live on July 19th, 2023. The session’s agenda was as follows: 00:00 Beginning of the session: the introduction 01:51 Project news: PrestaShop Developer Conference 04:37 Project news: PrestaShop 8.1 14:39 Demo: enable WebP or Avif in PrestaShop 8.1 20:21 Demo: enable developer mode with cookie in PrestaShop 9.0 24:14 Demo: RectorPHP in PrestaShop 9.0 29:06 Demo: changes in the developer documentation 38:52 Q&A session You can use the timestamps to jump directly to the parts you want to watch.

item.description: The seventh Live Update for the PrestaShop Project will happen on Wednesday, July 19th, 2023 at 4 pm (Paris time) on YouTube! We will go over the latest project updates, take a look at recent changes in the software, changes made in the developer documentation, and more! Remember that at the end of every meeting, there is a Q&A session. You can ask your questions during the presentation or beforehand. item.title: Freelance Developer and Translator: Meet SNor42
item.description: Have you ever wondered whoâ€™s hiding behind a Crowdin username? Itâ€™s time to find out! Contributor interviews are a great way of getting to know the people who participate in the PrestaShop project. For the second interview of 2023, we interview Norbert, aka SNor42. Ranked 29th on the top translator page, Norbert is a translator and proofreader on the Hungarian project. Hello SNor! :-) ðŸ‘‹ Can you tell me more about yourself?

item.title: PrestaShop Live Update - June 2023
item.description: The project’s live update was held for the sixth time this year and streamed live on June 21st, 2023. The session’s agenda was as follows: 00:00 Beginning of the session: the introduction 03:00 Project news: PrestaShop Developer Conference 04:33 Project news: PrestaShop 8.1 06:36 Demo: issue management in the PrestaShop project by @hibatallahAouadni 22:22 Demo: PrestaShop 9.0 roadmap by @fabienvallon 32:20 Demo: breaking changes & improvements in PrestaShop 9.0 by @boherm 47:14 Q&A session You can use the timestamps to jump directly to the parts you want to watch.

item.title: Announcing June PrestaShop Project Live Update
item.description: The sixth Live Update for the PrestaShop Project will happen on Wednesday, June 21st, 2023 at 4 pm (Paris time) on YouTube! We will go over the latest project updates, take a look at recent changes made in the developer documentation, and present two demos: Issue management in the PrestaShop Project by @hibatallahAouadni PrestaShop 9.0 roadmap by @fabienvallon Remember that at the end of every meeting, there is a Q&A session.

item.title: PrestaShop Live Update - May 2023
item.description: The project’s live update was held for the fifth time this year and streamed live on May 17th, 2023. The session’s agenda was as follows: 00:00 Beginning of the session: the introduction 02:07 Project news: PrestaShop 8.0.4 and 1.7.8.9 releases 03:06 Project news: PrestaShop 8.1 is ready for translation 04:47 Project news: two new interviews with the community 05:30 Project news: Classic theme and PrestaShop 9.0 09:09 Project news: minimum PHP compatibility for PrestaShop 9.

item.title: Announcing May PrestaShop Project Live Update
item.description: The fifth Live Update for the PrestaShop Project will happen on Wednesday, May 17th, 2023 at 4 pm (Paris time) on YouTube! We will go over the latest project updates, take a look at recent changes made in the developer documentation, and share some exciting news about PrestaShop 9.0. Remember that at the end of every meeting, there is a Q&A session. You can ask your questions during the presentation or beforehand.

item.title: Louis Authie: Freelancer, Contributor and Author
item.description: Have you ever wondered whoâ€™s hiding behind a GitHub username? Itâ€™s time to find out! Contributor interviews are a great way of getting to know the people who participate in the PrestaShop project. This month, meet Louis Authie, aka LouisAUTHIE. Louis is a freelance full stack developer at Web Helpers, with over 120 contributions on GitHub. Heâ€™s also a member of Friends of Presta, an association that gathers a community of developers and integrators around the open source ecommerce solution PrestaShop.
